website_summaries.verdict: The Propet Connelly Strap delighted many purchasers with its rustic style and durability. Purchasers enjoyed how easy it was to put on and remove. The removable insoles also gained this footwear some positive feedback. However, despite the claims that it fit comfortably, there were complaints that it was not true to size and width. Other issues with this model included the long strap but short Velcro and the stiffness of the platform. But in the end, the shoe came highly recommended by those who enjoyed wearing a comfortable pair of strap-closure shoes.
pros: Almost all of the owners lauded the Propet Connely Strap
it was one of the most comfortable walking shoes they have ever owned
The rugged looks of the trainer resonated well with a majority of wearers
A myriad of buyers claimed that this model was very durable
it lasted about a year or more
Plenty of reviewers liked how this merchandise fit
it was roomy in the toe box but snug at the heel
A lot of shoppers appreciated the easy-to-adjust straps
The removable insoles were a welcome feature for multiple folks
Several persons stated that this product was worth the price they paid for it
cons: A considerable number of people complained about the inconsistent width and length of the Propet Connelly Strap
some said it was long and wide while others mentioned it was short and narrow
The strap displeased a minority of users
it was very long, but the Velcro did not cover its entire length, so those with very slim feet found it hard to tighten
The trainer was stiff and needed to be broken in, according to several consumers
Because of durability issues like the interior lining deteriorating quickly or the outside stitchings unraveling, some testers considered this footgear pricey
Seams inside the shoe irritated the toes, noted a few individuals

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Well-fitting.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits well and looks really nice. My left foot swells from my mild kidney issues, so the straps need retightening after wearing for a bit. Other than that, I really like this pair, which is my second pair of Propets. Still wear my first pair for puttering around outside the house or running errands. They have loads of miles and memories on them and have walked where ancient kings and caesars have tread, literally! I keep this pair for casual outings and socializing when they're not likely to get dirty. The color goes well with blue jeans, gray or off-white khaki or olive cargo pants, even some blacks. 2 for 2 so far, Propet!
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and improves balance
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a friend who has difficulty walking. These shoes gave him much more balance and he has stopped using a cane, except occasionally. He likes the toe room. They are deep enough to easily add an insert, though he hasn't felt it necessary to use one because they are comfortable as is. The double velcro straps make it much easier to put on--better than the one strap he had before because it opens up more. He is very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Della Lee

customer_reviews.title: Junk don’t last
customer_reviews.text: They seem very comfortable not sure if the quality is there for the price. My concerns would be if they last long enough to be a $100+ pair of shoes Update after only 2 months I can no longer wear them my feet hurt in them Not good buy amazon recommend them as replacements for my Skechers that are no longer available the Skechers I got 5 years out of for just over half the cost of these If your a diabetic with feet issues these are junk don’t waste money
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe and fits perfect. My husband is disabled and has diabetes, Propet shoes fit the bill for his foot care. The slip ons and flap overs make for easy on/off of the shoe. They give him great support and are easy to adjust when there are swelling issues. This brand is the only shoe he wears!
customer_reviews.author: Clarence F. Eversole Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my feet feel uncomfortably warm !
customer_reviews.text: The Propet Men's Connelly Strap shoe style fits well, BUT needs more breathable mesh, so that my feet do not feel uncomfortably warm. I had to return them to Amazon.com. By comparison, I also recently purchased a pair of Propet Matthew Strap shoes, (from Zappo's), which have a greater amount of mesh - and they feel very comfortable & cool on my feet, as do many other past purchases of walking shoes - from various manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J

customer_reviews.title: Seem very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 89 year old dad for Christmas, as he was complaining that he could not find shoes with Velcro closures. He asked me for triple wide - I guess his foot bones have spread with age. I was afraid they would be so loose that his foot would slide around, but they are perfect. I will see how the shoes wear,, but he is very pleased with them so far, and so am I - they are not only good-looking, but sturdy enough so that I worry less about him falling. I didn't ask him about the arch support - I'm sure it is quite adequate. Thank you for making such a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Housum-Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe purchased for support.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a size 14 shoe, but he's feet get very swollen from lymphedema . So we bought size 15 & I was happy to see they had 2XX wide. That worked! The shoe is big enough for his swollen feet. The only issue is the back of the shoe. Its a bit difficult to get the back of the foot in. Shoe horn doesn't help, so I assist with widening the ankle support with my hands to get the foot in. Great walking shoe! Comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe-well made and worth the money. Good materials and great color. Had to return as shoe was too small to wear with foot brace. Would recommend for normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: ... is well made it fits my swollen feet quite nicely plenty of toe room which is a problem i ...
customer_reviews.text: the shoe is well made it fits my swollen feet quite nicely plenty of toe room which is a problem i have bee having very comfortable for walking
customer_reviews.author: Frank Nails

customer_reviews.title: Too large.
customer_reviews.text: These were for my son. I read many reviews before purchasing and most of them said purchase 1 size larger. I listened. I shouldn't have! I should have bought his normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Smith

customer_reviews.title: They look nice, but wearing them isn't so good
customer_reviews.text: Velcro straps are too long and they don't have "velcro" on the underside that is long enoush. Also, the sizes must run large. I wear a 10 1/2, bought a 10 and they are still too large. They look nice, but wearing them isn't so good..... I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Batt

customer_reviews.title: Lining has deteriorated prematurely
customer_reviews.text: Review of a previous pair: Outer structure (sole, heal, uppers) have help up fine, but the lining has deteriorated prematurely, especially around the heal where the metal substructure is now exposed an uncomfortable. I bought a replacement and hope for better

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED DURABLE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: These are great and durable shoes. Since the shoes are slightly small, I ordered the next size larger which is now a perfect fit. The Propet shoe company has many variations of sizes to fit many feet sizes. These shoes seem to be built to last.

customer_reviews.title: This is the second pair of shoes I have purchased ...

customer_reviews.title: Much better made and better sole than the Propet 'Walking Shoes'

I was a little reluctant to spend this much because of all the past disappointments involved, but these are worth it. They look good, too.

customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has wide feet and we thought this would work but the area above and to the side of the tongue became binding and painful. I even got a size larger after returning one pair but it did not matter.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't use for walking.
customer_reviews.text: My typical shoe size is 11 1/2 5E width. Got what I ordered. Only suggestion is that the toe box was quite pointed. A more generous wider toe box would be ideal. Noticed that most of Propet shoes are pointed- at least the many walking shoes I looked at. I kept the shoes because am going to use them for biking and like the strap design- no laces to get caught in chain. Plus I'm sure the shoes will expand over time. Also there are two inserts for each shoe- removed both and used my own that has much better arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: First try for propet shoes. Very satisfied with fit and price.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe that looks good too
customer_reviews.text: This the second pair of this style I've purchased because it wears well and looks good enough that it can easily transition from casual to business casual settings without screaming "walking shoe". My previous pair has reached a point where I'm going to relegate them to my yard work shoes but there's still a lot of life left in them.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Thale

customer_reviews.title: Ok for everday casual.
customer_reviews.text: Sizes ran small for me. Bought one pair on sale for $75 or so but had to return due to bad fit. Got 1 size larger and they charged me $95. Nice shoes but you can get a better value at big box sporting goods that have mega shoe dept.

customer_reviews.title: I love Propet shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Propet shoes, however, after owning several pairs, I found this shoe style runs small. Order 1/2 size larger than normal and you will be happy. Once again, return to Amazon was flawless and fast.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he was very happy with his shoes.
customer_reviews.author: malani

product_meta.title: Propét Men's Connelly Strap Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: The perfect combination of mesh and leather make this outdoor-inspired adjustable strap shoe a must-have. whether you're looking for extra volume or just want comfort with a sense of style, this shoe really delivers. features double footbed, rubber outsole and memory foam insole.
feature_bullets: Antimicrobial dri-lex lining and sock lining
